# EnumExtensions.GetDescription method

Returns the value of attribute of type [`EnumDescriptionAttribute`](../../iTin.Core.ComponentModel/EnumDescriptionAttribute.md) for this enum value. If this attribute is not defined returns null (Nothing in Visual Basic)

```csharp
public static string GetDescription(this Enum value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | Target enum value. |

## Return Value

A String that contains the value of attribute.
